pullrequest.title: Support only standard CMAKE format for BUILD_TYPES

content.raw:
Umm interesting. I have found that sentence in 2.6 documentation but no in 2.8 and if I remove them from our code, the final ```CMAKE_C_FLAGS``` are empty.

I also made a stupid test case and I can not reproduce the effect of automatically get Debug values added to CMAKE_C_FLAGS:

```
#!cmake

PROJECT(lala)

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG " -ggdb3")
message(STATUS "C_FLAGS_DEBUG: ${CMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG}")
message(STATUS "C_FLAGS: ${CMAKE_C_FLAGS}")
```
